title: Ebro In The Morning - Juneteenth + Eric Adams
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Ebro, Rosenberg and Laura Stylez star in HOT97's flagship program Ebro in the Morning - this episode aired on 6/18.

Ebro sounds off on Juneteenth and the establishment of a victims of slavery compensations fund (2:00), Laura Stylez has her patented Flashing Lights segments (14:30, 38:10, & 1:07), and NYC Mayoral Candidate Eric Adams joins the Crew (1:09:00). The Crew gives away Summer Jam Tickets and talks Father's Day.

Please like and subscribe to Ebro In The Morning.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
